name: Animal Forms
description: Master Xing Yi’s animal-inspired techniques for agility and striking power.

cards.title: Tiger Form
cards.description: A ferocious forward-driving attack that embodies the strength of a tiger.
bulletpoints: Sink into a low stance for power
Use both hands in simultaneous claw-like strikes
Generate explosive force from the hips
cards.summaryText: Prowl low, rip forward with paired claws, and let the hips drive the tiger’s surge.

cards.title: Eagle Form
cards.description: A long-range technique that focuses on precision strikes and quick movement.
bulletpoints: Use sweeping arm movements to control space
Keep a light and agile stance
Strike with focused fingertips targeting pressure points
cards.summaryText: Glide with wide wings, stay springy, and spear pressure points with eagle talons.
